name: astrometry.net-api-lite-worker
description: A worker companion of the astrometry.net-api-lite API, which does the processing.

scripts.build: npm run clean-dist && npm run tsc
scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TS,Node" -c "yellow.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
